surface.zone: Frankenstein the particulars of his formation but on this point he was impenetrable. Are you mad, my friend, said he, or whither does your senseless curiosity lead you- Would you also create for yourself & the world a daemonical enemy or to what does your questions tend. Peace, peace; learn my miseries & do not seek to encrease your own. Frankenstein discovered that I detail ed or made notes concerning his history he asked to see them & himself corrected and augmented them in many places but principally in guv giving the life & spirit of the the conver satins he held with his enemies- Since you have made an account ^ said he I would not that a mutilated one should go down to posterity. THus have ten days passed away while I have listened to the strangest tale that ever imagination formed. My thoughts I every feeling of my soul & ha have been drunk up by the interrest I felt m for my guest ^ one I wished to soothe him yet could can I tell counsel so infinitely miserable. Whose mind continually dwelt on horrors so destitute of every hope of consolation to live? Oh no- the oly joy he could feel can now feel know was in will be when he composesg his shattered mind ^ feelings to peace & death- Yet one feeling he enjoys, one comfort, the sourse offspring of solitude & delirium- he tho believed that when in dreams he saw holds converse with his friends, who consoled his miseries or instigated him excitement to his vengeance
